history.proof: intros ir1 ir2 H. induction H. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: IR_equiv_cons, IR_equiv_trans, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: IR_equiv_cons, IR_equiv_trans, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil. - apply Permutation_sym. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: IR_equiv_cons, IR_equiv_trans, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: IR_equiv_cons, IR_equiv_trans, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} Unable to unify "IR_equivalent [] []" with "Permutation [] []".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x : IR xs, ys : list IR H : IR_equivalent xs ys IHIR_equivalent : Permutation xs ys Unable to unify "IR_equivalent (?M1743 :: ?M1744) (?M1743 :: ?M1745)" with "Permutation (x :: xs) (x :: ys)".

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x : IR xs, ys : list IR H : IR_equivalent xs ys IHIR_equivalent : Permutation xs ys Unable to unify "Permutation xs ys" with "Permutation (x :: xs) (x :: ys)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x, y : IR xs, ys : list IR H : IR_equivalent xs ys H0 : good_move x y IHIR_equivalent : Permutation xs ys Unable to unify "Permutation (?M1747 :: ?M1744) (?M1745 ++ ?M1747 :: ?M1746)" with "Permutation (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)".

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x, y : IR xs, ys : list IR H : IR_equivalent xs ys H0 : good_move x y IHIR_equivalent : Permutation xs ys Unable to unify "Permutation (y :: x :: ys) (x :: y :: ys)" with "Permutation (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (l l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), Permutation (a :: l) (l1 ++ a :: l2) -> Permutation l (l1 ++ l2)" on hypothesis of type "Permutation xs ys".

In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} x, y : IR xs, ys : list IR H : IR_equivalent xs ys H0 : good_move x y IHIR_equivalent : Permutation xs ys Unable to unify "Permutation xs ys" with "Permutation (y :: x :: ys) (x :: y :: xs)".

original: intros ir1 ir2 H. induction H. - apply IR_equiv_nil. - apply IR_equiv_cons. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply Permutation_cons_app. apply (Permutation_sym (perm_swap y x ys)). apply Permutation_cons_app_inv in IHIR_equivalent. apply Permutation_sym. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2:=ys). + apply IHIR_equivalent1. + apply IHIR_equivalent2.
